isis.stitle: TSI 95-04-01 - Bendix MV3 Valve Exhaust Port Line Diameter and Connection Change

subjectgroup.subject: Bendix MV3 Valve Exhaust Port Line Diameter and Connection Change

geninfo.para: The Bendix MV3 valve installed on 5000, 9200, 9300, and 9400 Models built from June 1, 1994 through August 11, 1994, utilize a Parker-Hannifin threaded "push-to-connect" fitting at the exhaust port location for use with a 3/8 inch Synflex exhaust line.

A change has been made to the Bendix MV3 parking brake control valve that will eliminate the threaded 3/8 inch "push-to-connect" air line fitting at the exhaust port, and change the exhaust line diameter. The 3/8 inch fitting has been replaced with a tapered 1/2 inch nipple. The exhaust line size has been changed from 3/8 inch to 1/2 inch.

note.para: This letter is supplied for future maintenance information only. There are no other changes to the MV3 valve and performance characteristics are unchanged.

svcproc.title: SERVICE PROCEDURE
svcproc.para: Prior to installation of the new style MV3 valve part number 2014785C92 on units originally built with the 3/8 inch exhaust port line with "push-to-connect" fittings, a new 1/2 inch diameter, black, Synflex exhaust line must be installed. This new line should be 40 inches long and routed along the existing 3/8 inch exhaust line and tie strapped to the harness every 8 inches. It will not be necessary to remove the original 3/8 inch exhaust line. Remove the end of the 3/8 inch line from the hole in the fire wall and replace it with the end of the new 1/2 inch line. No enlargement of the exit hole should be required. Press the valve end of the new exhaust line firmly over the tapered exhaust port nipple. Complete the installation of the new MV3 valve.
